misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki and younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. Known for his calculated approach and steely gaze on the course, Eero has become a formidable competitor.

With seven past appearances, Eero is set to make his eighth showing at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Although the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero has tasted individual glory by winning the Victor Trophy once, showcasing his prowess as a top-tier golfer.

Off the course, Eero is known for his disciplined lifestyle and dedication to improving his game. Sources say he has been working on his mental game a lot recently. With his sights set on the upcoming tournament, Eero is undoubtedly one to watch as he seeks to add his name to the illustrious list of Hector Trophée champions.
